content: समष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Collective pervasion or aggregate, an aggregate which is considered as made up of parts each of which is consubstantially the same with the whole (<ab>opp.</ab> व्यष्टि <ab>q. v.</ab>); समष्टिरीशः सर्वेषां स्वात्मतादात्म्यवेदनात् . तदभावात्तदन्ये तु ज्ञायंते व्यष्टिसंज्ञया .. <ls>Pañcadaśī.</ls> {@--2@} Totality.
